parameters: \af[4]\n<\N[4]>Actually I hear that's been part of the problem.
Looking at your case notes here...
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>You had said you felt like a "zombie." As if
you have no control over your actions.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>And then, of course, you did those things.
Oh my, the things you did.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>Your poor family had to leave their
Well there's a new drug I'm prescribing for you.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>Take this tonight before you go to bed.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>There's not a lot more I can do
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>I will be seeing you again soon.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>You MUST take that medication every day!
It's just really important that you take it.
So you can talk can you?
\af[1]\n<\N[1]>It's controlling me. It's making me do things.
Things I don't want to do.
\af[4]\n<\N[4]>We can't do that. You know we can't do that.
